title: HDFC ERGO General Insurance Company Limited
BHARAT SOOKSHMA UDYAM SURAKSHA POLICY
sample_text:
Loss Minimization
This is an additional cover that extends the insurance cover 
that We give under the Bharat Sookshma Udyam Suraksha. 
We give these additional covers if You have appliedto and 
paid premium for the covers and We have accepted to give 
covers to You.
Loss Minimization
In consideration of additional premium and notwithstanding 
contrary contained in the policy, it is hereby agreed that We will 
pay reasonable expenses incurred to safe guard the property 
including moving / shifting of property to prevent aggravation 
of Loss or damage to the Insured’s property as specified in
